channel.title: Stage 2 on Check Point CloudGuard Network Security Workshop - AWS GWLB
channel.description: Recent content in Stage 2 on Check Point CloudGuard Network Security Workshop - AWS GWLB

item.title: Stage 2 Page 2
item.description: Stage 2 Page 2 Welcome In this workshop you will learn how to deploy Check Point CGNS with AWS Gateway load balancer as well as architecture options to support 3 different traffic flows: outbound, east-west, and inbound.
